div2.p: And other notes from the future

div1.p: The president is gone.
And the vice president is gone too.
We created a world where
we didn't need these false idols.
The priest is gone. The missonaries are all gone too.
We didn't need them telling us what to do.
We decided to some thinking for ourselves.
So now
The police are gone,
The sherrifs and deputies and hey the criminals are all gone too.
Theres no jails and no prisons, no heartless
warehouses full of people, living breathing.
We didn't want those things anymore. So we
Got rid of all our bosses, we all quit our "jobs"
and realized we could actually find our purpose...
We got rid of the Landlords ... it
wasn't there land to "lord" anyway ...
and we got rid of renters too.
Now were all just livers... livers ?
Haha ... I mean were all people who get to be alive,
People who get to experience our world
and not just fight to survive it.
So we got rid of the corporations. That's right.
Now the CEOs are gone and the shareholders and investors and even the consumers are gone too.
We got rid of them when
They were treating the rest of the world like a game ...
They played by unfair rules...
So we burned the Rulebook
And the game board, all the cards and the dice,
and we got rid of the markets and the money
we started valuing people ...animals ...plants ... the world ...
For what they are :
Gifts ... Blessigngs ... not from any of us ... to all of us ...
Gifts.
So we got rid of the food prices and the "cost" of healthcare and
decided to live in abundance. We stopped putting a price tag on life.
So we got rid of the rich. And we got rid of the poor. We decided that we all could do more...
We got rid of the borders and walls... The binary structures that kept us apart...
We realized how fragile they were, how easily they cdould crumble.
They didn't stand a chance against the power we had ...
That we still have.
The power of love ... creativity ...solidarity
We nenver once surrendered.
So now the hatred is gone. The silence and shame too.
We got rid of them; we loved to hard !
In the best way possible. We embodied our truths.
We didn't let lies stop us. So we got rid of the mass media and legislators are all gone too !
We got rid of the teachers, there are no more of them and we got rid of the students too.
We realized we have lots more fun when we all become learners, creators, participants in our reality and not mere predefined roles.
And we were so successful ! We still are.
And now the violence is all gone,
and the tanks and guns are gone too.
The gas is gone, the bombs, the chemicals they dumped into the earth our home.
They are all gone.
We got rid of them !
Chose life,
Chose love, chose connection instead of fear.
We chose each other.And we still do. That's how we made it so far.
But we looked beyond ourselves too and we chose the world, again as it is, gifts, glorious and abundant and we realized we had so much we were missing.
So we don't have the scarcity the fear and coercion any more.
No more extraction and expansion and exploitation - that's all gone. We embraced cycles and transitions, trangressions, transformations,
We got rid of control and welcomed in community. And we thrive, and we thrive, and we thrive, and we thrive.
They may burn our books but we will still write more.
